scripts.ci: npm ci && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm ci
scripts.ncu: pnpm ncu:patch && pnpm ncu:minor && pnpm ncu:major
scripts.ncu:minor: ncu -t minor -u && pnpm -r exec ncu -t minor -u -x @leanup/*,typescript
scripts.ncu:patch: ncu -t patch -u && pnpm -r exec ncu -t patch -u
scripts.pack: lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm install && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --stream -- npm pack
scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || true) && pnpm -r exec npm outdated
scripts.remove: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json *.log *.tgz && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json *.log *.tgz && git clean -f -d -X
scripts.update: npm install && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --no-bail --stream -- npm install
